thread.title: Carol Faucher
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Carol Faucher

author: Carol Faucher
title: Carol Faucher
text:
I left home to go on a wonderful vacation but I forgot to pack my Titan Fluid !!
I called Shelby on Friday in customer service and told her my problem. I wanted to make sure it got their 'Next Day" so Fedex was my choice, $86.27. She said she could get it their by USPS for a lot cheaper.
She got my order shipped to a hotel, which I received the next day and freight was only $25.99 for a Saturday delivery.
I still can't believe how smooth the whole transaction went.
Thank you so much !!
Carol
